verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>; For it is good <S%H2896><s%> to sing praises <S%H2167><s%> unto our God <S%H430><s%>; For it is pleasant <S%H5273><s%>, and praise <S%H8416><s%> is comely <S%H5000><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> doth build up <S%H1129><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; He gathereth together <S%H3664><s%> the outcasts <S%H1760><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
He healeth <S%H7495><s%> the broken <S%H7665><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%>, And bindeth up <S%H2280><s%> their wounds <S%H6094><s%>.
He counteth <S%H4487><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of the stars <S%H3556><s%>; He calleth <S%H7121><s%> them all by their names <S%H8034><s%>.
Great <S%H1419><s%> is our Lord <S%H113><s%>, and mighty <S%H7227><s%> in power <S%H3581><s%>; His understanding <S%H8394><s%> is infinite <S%H4557><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> upholdeth <S%H5749><s%> the meek <S%H6035><s%>: He bringeth <S%H8213><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> down <S%H8213><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>.
Sing <S%H6030><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> with thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>; Sing praises <S%H2167><s%> upon the harp <S%H3658><s%> unto our God <S%H430><s%>,

Who covereth <S%H3680><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> with clouds <S%H5645><s%>, Who prepareth <S%H3559><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> for the earth <S%H776><s%>, Who maketh grass <S%H2682><s%> to grow <S%H6779><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>.
He giveth <S%H5414><s%> to the beast <S%H929><s%> his food <S%H3899><s%>, And to the young <S%H1121><s%> ravens <S%H6158><s%> which cry <S%H7121><s%>.
He delighteth <S%H2654><s%> not in the strength <S%H1369><s%> of the horse <S%H5483><s%>: He taketh no pleasure <S%H7521><s%> in the legs <S%H7785><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> taketh pleasure <S%H7521><s%> in them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him <S%H3176><s%>, In those that hope in his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>.
Praise <S%H7623><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, O Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; Praise <S%H1984><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, O Zion <S%H6726><s%>.
For he hath strengthened <S%H2388><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> of thy gates <S%H8179><s%>; He hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> thy children <S%H1121><s%> within thee <S%H7130><s%>.
He maketh <S%H7760><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in thy borders <S%H1366><s%>; He filleth <S%H7646><s%> thee with the finest <S%H2459><s%> of the wheat <S%H2406><s%>.
He sendeth out <S%H7971><s%> his commandment <S%H565><s%> upon earth <S%H776><s%>; His word <S%H1697><s%> runneth <S%H7323><s%> very swiftly <S%H4120><s%>.
He giveth <S%H5414><s%> snow <S%H7950><s%> like wool <S%H6785><s%>; He scattereth <S%H6340><s%> the hoar-frost <S%H3713><s%> like ashes <S%H665><s%>.
He casteth forth <S%H7993><s%> his ice <S%H7140><s%> like morsels <S%H6595><s%>: Who can stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his cold <S%H7135><s%>?
He sendeth out <S%H7971><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>, and melteth <S%H4529><s%> them <S%H7307><s%>: He causeth his wind to blow <S%H5380><s%>, and the waters <S%H4325><s%> flow <S%H5140><s%>.
He showeth <S%H5046><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, His statutes <S%H2706><s%> and his ordinances <S%H4941><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
He hath not dealt <S%H6213><s%> so with any nation <S%H1471><s%>; And as for his ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, they have not known <S%H3045><s%> them <S%H1984><s%>. Praise ye Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>.
